title: Guerner & Irmãos
visitCompanyDescription: A Guerner & Irmãos, SA, tem como atividade a produção de têxteis técnicos para a agricultura e construção civil, utilizando como matéria-prima principal o polietileno.
presentationSectionDescription: Navigate directly to the section that talks about our company and its history.
productionSectionDescription: Take a look at the section that talks about our company's production methods.
visitProductsDescription: We provide a lengthy, reliable and high quality group of products for agriculture and construction.
